meanings.sent1: The instructions were uncomplicated and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: She preferred uncomplicated recipes for quick meals.
meanings.sent3: His uncomplicated approach to problem-solving always amazed his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The uncomplicated design of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The uncomplicated melody of the song stayed in my mind all day.

meanings.sent3: The uncomplicated game brought joy to the children for hours.
